column4: During my Ubuntu install (10.10) I got an error stating that, more or less, the bootloader could not be created.  When attempting a reinstall I'm having difficulty selecting a proper location for install.  The first install created a new partition, but in my experience just deleting it can cause problems.  I have an image here (- i56.tinypic.com/dpy9ur.png -) of my partition setup using Gparted
on a live disk.  Any assistance in how to move forward would be greatly appreciate.  Thanks. =]
did you do a md5sum on it
